item.description:
A New Paradigm for Women in Business
Purpose, People and Profits in the Technology Age

How can today's women business owners survive the rapid changes shaped by shifting consumer sensibilities, the ineffectiveness of traditional business models, and new technologies? The answer lies in a new paradigm that embraces purpose, passion, and concern for all stakeholders while remaining profitable. The new model empowers women to pursue ideas of social justice and environmental stewardship and create meaningful workplaces by speaking to the new trends of conscious capitalism, mindfulness in business, and authentic leadership in the networked economy. Learn how women are shaping this new paradigm in their own way by confidently pursuing their passions, adopting new technologies, and successfully promoting social entrepreneurship.

8:30 a.m. to noon

Registration Fee
$50 or $65 with optional lunch

For more information
Please call us at 413.737.6712 x100

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group
